content: this is a pattern i designed some time ago i used less than 1 ball of yarn to make a blanket materials needed 4mm hook stitch markers darning needle scissors only simple terms used in the pattern there are two downloads available us terms and uk terms us terms chain chain single_crochet single_crochet double_crochet double_crochet standing double st double_crochet half double half_double_crochet stitch/stitches st/sts slip_stitch slip_stitch uk terms chain chain double_crochet double_crochet treble_crochet treble_crochet standing treble st treble_crochet half treble half_double_crochet stitch/stitches st/sts slip_stitch slip_stitch i hope you enjoy making this gorgeous baby blanket
